actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Jean Lafitte National Historical Park in the State of Louisiana.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Jean Lafitte National Park in Louisiana. Establishes the Delta Region Preservation Commission to advise the Secretary of the Interior on general policies and specific matters related to the planning, administration, and development of such park.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Jean Lafitte National Historical Park in the State of Louisiana.
